snippet: Six finalists, including three women and the film director Steve McQueen (“12 Years a Slave”), have been named finalists for the Hugo Boss Prize.
abstract: Carol Vogel Inside Art column; six finalists are named for Hugo Boss Prize; online art market Artnet will start 24-hour global news site for art world; Storm King Art Center plans exhibition inspired by Zhang Huan sculpture; Amy Cappellazzo will step down as Sotheby's chairman of postwar and contemporary art development.
lead_paragraph: Six finalists, including three women and the film director Steve McQueen (“12 Years a Slave”), have been named finalists for the Hugo Boss Prize.

headline.main: Steve McQueen Among 6 Hugo Boss Prize Finalists
headline.print_headline: Steve McQueen Among 6 Hugo Boss Prize Finalists
